sentences.en: An instrument used to measure tactile sensitivity.
sentences.cn: 触觉测量计用来测量触觉的一种装置.

sentences.en: Babies who sleep with their parents receive much more tactile stimulation than babies who sleep in a cot.
sentences.cn: 婴儿和父母睡在一块儿比单独睡在婴儿床中能得到更多的触觉刺激。

sentences.en: Handle may be defined as a subjective tactile evaluation of the textile quality.
sentences.cn: 手感可定义为织物质量的触觉评价方法.

sentences.en: Heat, cold, tactile and other sensations contribute to flavour.
sentences.cn: 热、冷、触觉和其他感觉构成了食物风味的一部分。

sentences.en: Human mind constantly depend on objects which are taken from visual, auditory, olfactory, gustatory and tactile means.
sentences.cn: 人的心理不断地依赖于从视觉，听觉，嗅觉，味觉和触觉得到的目标。

sentences.en: Other unpleasant changes may include odor production or alternations in tactile characteristics.
sentences.cn: 另外还有使人感到不愉快的其它现象,诸如产生气味或是手感起变化等情况.

sentences.en: Sheepskin - like soft texture, we enjoy the infinite charm from tactile senses.
sentences.cn: 羊皮般的柔软质感, 享受触觉感官的无限魅力.

sentences.en: Tactile and auditory stimuli provoke convulsions with opisthotonos.
sentences.cn: 触觉和听觉的刺激可诱使病牛惊厥和角弓反张.

sentences.en: Tactile and auditory stimuli provoke convulsions with opposthotonis.
sentences.cn: 触觉和听觉的刺激可诱发惊厥和角弓反张.

sentences.en: Tactile communication uses touch rather than sight or hearing.
sentences.cn: 触觉交流,是用触摸感觉,而不是用看或听来感觉.

sentences.en: The children are very tactile with warm, loving natures.
sentences.cn: 小孩子说话时喜欢用上热烈、表达喜爱的肢体触碰。

sentences.en: Touch each object you want to touch as if tomorrow your tactile sense would fail.
sentences.cn: 去触摸你想摸的每个物体,就像你明天会推动触觉意识一样.

sentences.en: Tweed is timeless, tactile and tough.
sentences.cn: 粗花呢从不过时，手感很好，结实耐磨。

words.tran_cn: 触觉的；触觉器官的；凭感觉的
[生理]触觉的，有触觉的；能触知的

phrases.tran_cn: 触觉感受器；触感传感器

trans.tran_cn: 触觉的，触觉感知的，能触知的，有形的
trans.tran_en: relating to your sense of touch
